name: Sage Stevenson
text: They delivered to the wrong address...I double-checked that I had entered the correct address. They assured me they delivered to the correct address but we have a camera on the doorbell and we never saw them. Nothing was offered to right their wrong, all I wanted was an apology. Poor customer service.

name: GRie VoUS
text: You Rock! Great deals and the best pizza in town. You never do me wrong Blackjack ü§§

name: Cheyanne Sinkhorn
text: So thankful of these guys im staying at my brothers while I do engine work on my car, brother went to sleep early they were super awesome about calling and meeting me outside to get the food, thanks again so much he would of been so mad thanks again!! Great pizza!! Great delivery guy!!@

name: Allison Emge
text: We like Blackjack Pizza. The employees seem to be working their tails off getting all the orders done and doing a great job. I just hope they are having fun while they work.

name: Robert Evans
text: We use this Blackjack pretty regularly for delivery and they have consistently delivered the correct order, quickly and with a smile for years now. Good pizza, fair prices, fast friendly service - go to pizza for delivery, every time. ‚Ä¶More

text: I've tried pizza everywhere in town and this place has the best !

text: Everything here is delicious! Their salads are the best.

name: Christopher Sherman
text: This place always delivers. They serve excellent dishes for reasonable prices, there is no waiting time even when they are packed.

name: Pete Jones
text: This place is always great! Much better than their sister store on 16th st. I order at least once every other week from here and it never disappoints!!!‚Äô

name: J E
text: I ordered the chicken Caesar salad and there was a bug in it. I don't know if they don't wash their lettuce or if it's ready to eat but have caution if you are going to order their salads.

name: Jessica Dukelow
text: This is my very first pizza experience since moving to colorado and I am SO glad I chose these guys! I think it might be the best place I've ever gotten pizza from. The people in the store are so friendly and helpful, delivery was super quick, and the food is amazing, (I highly recommend the cinnamon breadüòç), such good quality.

name: bt gonzo
text: Great people great pizza. Good place to work

name: Brea Nugent
text: We just moved up to NoCo from Castle Rock and we are so excited we have Black Jack's pizza again! We have ordered from them a few times now and they always seize to amaze us. Always right, and always extra dressing just like we asked. Could not be happier with good food, cheap price, and excellent customer service!

name: Josh Wagner
text: Great place, order is always correct and made well. I frequent this place often since I can walk right over from my job and they've always treated me wonderfully.

text: I have always loved this pizza shop. It's located in central Greeley which makes the delivery Zone spread out further. This place is always busy and regardless of how busy it is we don't wait too long for food. I always like to use the ‚Ä¶More

name: Wendy McCoy
text: I ordered our pizza and pint( the coupon name) at 8:10 pm. Was told it would be 45 min. At 9:30 we got our COLD pizza and melted ice cream.  Delivered to us while my husband was in the phone with Blackjack. They said they just got behind because of the ballgame. Thanks for the expensive cold pizza.

name: Sheila Conlon
text: Yes chain, but when your new home doesn't have one you miss it.. Hands down 1000 times more responsive than any other chain. Really go the extra to make sure you get what you order, how you want it.

name: Jason Croan
text: All I have to say, there was an order error, and management did not disappoint!!! They made sure I originally got what I ordered! Best Pizza around Greeley!!
